resources.string:
HOW TO REACH KALBURGI (GULBARGA) BRIEF DESCRIPTION 
 
• Gulbarga(Kalburgi) is major city and district of the North Karnataka region. Gulbarga is at a 623 km from Bangalore and 220 km from Hyderabad. 
 
• Gulbarga(Kalburgi) is well connected by Road and train from all the major cities from Karnataka,Maharastra, Telangana, Andhra and Tamilnadu. 
 
• You will get Buses at regular intervals from almost all the cities of Karnataka. You can check the Bus availability at http://www.ksrtc.in/oprs-web/ and https://www.redbus.in/bus-tickets/ (Use this Redbus site to only check the buses while booking seats use particular traveler site). 
 
• If you are travelling from Maharashtra, Gulbarga has well connected train route from Mumbai and Pune cities and also you have the sleeper buses from Mumbai and Pune cities which can checked at http://www.ksrtc.in/oprs-web/. 
 
• The nearest big city to Gulbarga from Maharashtra is Solapur which is at a distance of 125 KM and well connected by train (take 2 Hours to reach) and Bus Route (takes 3-4 hours approx.). 
 
• Gulbarga is having the train route to the Srirangam, Madurai, KanyaKumari, Nagercoil, Chennai, Hydrabad, Secunderabad, Kakinada, Vijaywada, Visakhapatnam, Bhubaneswar some train details are above. 
 
• If you are travelling from Bangalore then it will take approx 12 hours to Gulbarga the best train is Hassan-Solapur(22134) Express(Also known as Solapur-Yesvantpur Express), which will leave Yesvantpur at 8.50 PM and will reach Gulbarga by 6.30 AM and Same train will Run from Gulbarga at 8.50 PM and will reach Yesvantpur by 7.20 AM Daily. You can choose alternatively 17308(Basava Express which will be starting and Ending at Mysore) and 11301 (udayan Express) or KSRTC ,VRL,SRS BUS services some BUS details are above.


HOW TO REACH VENUE: 
 
The Venue of Chaturmasya is Sri Rukmini Vitthal Mandir Bramhapur Gulbarga(Kalburgi) which also popularly known as Sri Raghavendra Swami Math Bramhapur Gulbarga(Kalburgi) 
 
Distance From Gulbarga(Kalburgi) Central Bus Stand to Uttaradi Mutt Brahmpur (which also popularly known as Sri Raghavendra Swami Math Brahmpur Gulbarga) is 2 KM. 
You can take the Local Autos Since OLA and UBER availability is lees and can tell the above address and they will charge approx 30 to 50 RS per trip 
 
Distance From Gulbarga(Kalburgi) Railway Station to Uttaradi Mutt Brahmpur (which also popularly known as Sri Raghavendra Swami Math Brahmpur Gulbarga) is 3 KM. 
 
You can take the Local Autos Since OLA and UBER availability is less and can tell the above address and they will charge approx 50 RS per trip
